name: Hex
title: hex.tech
shortDescription: Hex is a collaborative, AI-powered workspace designed for data teams. It integrates various data workflows into a single platform, supporting SQL, Python, R, and more. Users can go from simple queries to complex analyses and build interactive data apps. Example use case: ClickUp utilized Hex to enhance a data science project into a comprehensive customer retention program.
pros: Supports SQL, Python, R in one platform
AI-powered features for enhanced data analysis
Strong collaboration and interactive reporting tools
cons: May require technical knowledge to fully utilize
